content: I've been using the Omada Social Sports for about a month, and im really enjoying it gives you the gambling taste without losing ans penny, you can make predictions, and compete against your friend and other users Users earn coins for each correct prediction, which they can use to purchase in-app items such as avatars, stickers, and other customization options, Coins can also be used to enter competitions and win prizesThe app covers a wide variety of sports, including soccer, basketball, football, baseball, and more. It also has a number of competitive features, such as leaderboards, competitions, and challengespersonally i use it to test my sport betting technique, analysis to find the perfect method and not lossing moneyI am not offering any services, and i don't have any interest in sharing it is an app that i heard about from a French influencer "NasDas". i tried it, liked it, and wanted to share it on the forum.

comments.body: I can see on playstore that they have over 1 million downloads already and it is highly rated by those that downloaded the app. It is about sport betting. I will try to gamble on the site with some people and see how it works. But this is not about casinos, just sport.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: That sounds like a good betting application I think but still I won't use that one myself because it's not worth it to purchase in-app items as I don't really enjoy in-app items at all. comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: I just downloaded the app. This is just like some prediction app that we have out there, where everyone has to predict the outcome of a particular game based on their expectations, but here you earn a reward for having the most accurate predictions. I see some features like how to buy and unlock some rewards in the app, which requires you to pay from external funds based on your currency, which means people can also convert some of their rewards to real cash and withdraw them to their accounts. If that's correct, it's indeed a nice app to learn and earn at the same time. We will have to look for any interesting friends with whom we might have the same desired sport location so that we can try this out and see how friends-to friends playing works.
